name: Ground Up Gourmet
description:
Originally planned for release in 2020, work on Ground Up Gourmet ended up stalling and we figured it would be better to release it rather than leave it on the chopping block!

While unfinished, the bulk of what we wanted to go for is there :)

F - fullscreen
` - quit game
WASD - move
v - show/hide ticketline
spacebar - interact
arrow keys - cooking controls
r - open recipe book (while holding a plate)
